bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Later Roman Egypt: Society, Religion, Economy and Administration. (Collected Studies Series. 758.)
Aldershot, Variorum, 2003, 8°, pp. i-xii; - articles I-XXIV, s.p.; - pp. 1-6; - 1-2, 1 portrait, graphiques, tabl., arbres généal. et 2 pll. ISBN 0-86078-899-7. £55.
Reproduction de 24 articles (1977-1997). - Pp. 1-6: Addenda; - 1-2: Index.

C.R. par James G. Keenan, SCI 25 (2006) pp. 170-173. - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 79 (2004) Nos 157-158, pp. 366-368. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 49 (2003) pp. 120-121. - Jean Lenaerts, Latomus 65 (2006) pp. 834-835.
